description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. After minutes of studying XBLIG Memes, we have created  The Ultimate Super XBLIG Game-App Thing! You know this is a surefire hit, because it has ZOMBIES! Yes, Zombies, the one constant known to launch any title, however stupid, to the top of the charts. But wait! Theres More! We even have AVATARS! And, download now to try out your Free Trial, and we'll throw in extra EXTREMENESS! Download NOW!!
